BUSINESS AUTOMATION

Run Your Entire Business on One Powerful Platform

Odoo is an all-in-one business management software that replaces dozens of scattered tools with one integrated system. Whether you're running a restaurant, retail store, startup, school, or manufacturing business—Odoo gives you everything you need to operate smoothly, efficiently, and profitably.

At OKS, we help Kenyan businesses unlock the full power of Odoo through world-class setup, customization, automation, and training.

What Is Odoo?

Odoo is a modular business platform with integrated apps for every aspect of your business. Everything is connected—no more switching between different software.

Point of Sale (POS)

Complete retail management

Inventory & Stock

Real-time stock control

Accounting & Invoicing

Financial management

CRM & Sales

Customer relationship management

HR & Payroll

Employee management

Purchasing & Manufacturing

Operations management

Why Every Business Needs Odoo

Whether small or large, businesses succeed when systems are organized.

Visibility

Real-time dashboards for sales, stock levels, revenue, staff performance, and expenses.

Efficiency

Automated workflows reduce manual tasks and human errors.

Scalability

Start with one module and grow as your business grows—with no limits.

Cost-Reduction

Replace 10+ software subscriptions with one unified platform.

Decision Power

Data-driven insights that help owners make confident business decisions.

Odoo Community vs Odoo Enterprise

Which should you choose?

Community Edition

Free & Open Source

Perfect for small to medium businesses looking for core functionality without subscription fees.

100% free to use

No license fees

Fully customizable

Open source flexibility

Core functionality

POS, Inventory, Sales, Basic Accounting

Your own server

Full control and privacy

This is where OKS excels—turning Community Edition into a powerful system customized to your workflow.

Enterprise Edition

Paid & Premium

Best for businesses needing advanced features and mobile access.

Mobile apps included

Full mobile access

Advanced accounting

Automated reconciliation

Studio included

No-code app builder

Official support

From Odoo S.A

Great for growing companies that need premium features and official support.
